definition: the Baidu 10 mythical creatures (a set of hoax animals and puns linked to PRC Internet censorship)

sentences.english: The animal imaged deity of the nether world buried in the tomb was surposed to have the fu…
sentences.chinese: 土伯后土神兽形象置于墓中有辟邪镇墓作用。

sentences.english: A gold necklace with intricate depictions of animals.
sentences.chinese: 一条刻有未知神兽的金项链。

sentences.english: Tiger is regarded as angel beast, able to press down evil and blest peace.
sentences.chinese: 民间更视虎为神兽，借其镇邪辟恶，保佑安宁。

sentences.english: ZhaoCheng seek to a deer say god beast, also said will talk.
sentences.chinese: 赵盛找来一头鹿说是神兽，还说会说话。

sentences.english: I love having everything just an arm's reach away!
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢神兽就能够到所有的东西。

sentences.english: His name calls arms of tooth god animal to defend.
sentences.chinese: 他的名字叫牙神兽兵卫。

sentences.english: Is a white Ze, ancient absolute being monster white Ze.
The research of the triangle-rimed god-beast-pattern mirror is a main problem focused together by academic circles both China and Japan.
sentences.chinese: 三角缘神兽镜的研究是中日两国学界共同关注的课题。

sentences.english: Considering that the source of the mythological animals with wings and squamae can trace to forepart of New Stone Age.
sentences.chinese: 认为带翼神兽之渊源确可上溯到中国早期新石器时期。

sentences.english: Grass Mud Horse is a rare animal and the most famous of the Ten Legendary Beasts of Baidu.
sentences.chinese: 草泥马是一种稀有动物，并被百度评为十大神兽之一。

definition: White Tiger (the seven mansions of the west sky)/(slang) hairless female genitalia

four divinities/four divine emperors/four mythical creatures symbolic of prosperity and longevity, namely the phoenix 鳳|凤[feng4], turtle 龜|龟[gui1], dragon 龍|龙[long2] and Chinese unicorn 麒麟[qi2 lin2]/also 四象[si4 xiang4], the four division of the sky
the distant past/ancient times/antiquity/early historical times

Azure Dragon, one of the four symbols of the Chinese constellations, also known as the Azure Dragon of the East 東方青龍|东方青龙[Dong1 fang1 Qing1 long2] or 東方蒼龍|东方苍龙[Dong1 fang1 Cang1 long2]/(slang) man without pubic hair
Vermilion Bird (the seven mansions of the south sky)
Black Tortoise (the seven mansions of the north sky)/(in Daoism) God of the north sky
